name: Mexiball
summary:
Sharpen your mind with the latest mind-bender from Donut Games, a hot & spicy puzzle game where you sort, roll and connect balls to clear them off the board.
The rules are easy! Just drag the balls with your finger and match them using as few moves as possible.
However, things start to get tricky once lasers, colorizers, gates and other fun elements get thrown into the mix.
No time for siesta, come on and join the fun!
